data.name: Dungeon Defenders II - The Awakening Costume Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Harbinger isn’t the only thing awakening. Defeat him aboard his airship in style with these brand-new costumes and new robotic G4-T0 companion! Pick up The Awakening Costume Pack now:

  • $20 of in-game currency (2000 gems)
  • 4 Awakening Costumes (value of 3200 gems)
  • G4-T0 Premium Pet (value of 600 gems)
  • Exclusive “Awakened Defender” Title
data.about_the_game:
The Harbinger isn’t the only thing awakening. Defeat him aboard his airship in style with these brand-new costumes and new robotic G4-T0 companion! Pick up The Awakening Costume Pack now:

  • $20 of in-game currency (2000 gems)
  • 4 Awakening Costumes (value of 3200 gems)
  • G4-T0 Premium Pet (value of 600 gems)
  • Exclusive “Awakened Defender” Title
data.short_description: The Harbinger isn’t the only thing awakening. Defeat him aboard his airship in style with these brand-new costumes and new robotic G4-T0 companion!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1)
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
